item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: All Fish And Where To Find Them
item.description:
In Disney Dreamlight Valley , players have access to multiple Royal Tools, each designed for specific tasks essential for daily activities within the game. The Royal Fishing Pole is utilized for fishing across the various bodies of water found in the Valley's biomes. The base game's region, known as the Valley, is divided into eight distinct biomes, offering diverse fishing opportunities in ponds, rivers, and even ocean fishing along the expansive coastline of Dazzle Beach.

Each fish, sea creature, or other fishable catch in Disney Dreamlight Valley can be caught in specific biomes, with varying levels of rarity denoted by the color of its fishing pool, when applicable. The list below provides detailed information about all available fish, seafood, sea creatures, and crafting materials obtained via Fishing in Disney Dreamlight Valley , including how and where players can catch them.

Updated March 4, 2025, by Usama Ali: Disney Dreamlight Valley has expanded its horizons with another DLC expansion called The Storybook Vale. Both “A Rift in Time” and “The Storybook Vale” have introduced a wealth of new content for players to explore and discover. There’s also a fresh batch of fish to catch in The Storybook Vale, each unique to the new biomes. There are eight new fish species spread across The Bind, Ever After, and Mythopia. Some fish are more common than others, and some may only appear under specific conditions (like during certain weather or times of day). This guide has been thoroughly updated with the newest fishes players can find in The Storybook Vale in Disney Dreamlight Valley.

What Ingredients & Materials Are Obtained By Fishing?

In Disney Dreamlight Valley , fishing can yield three main types of catches: fish , seafood , or crafting materials . Fish and seafood are primarily used in cooking recipes, which can be prepared to restore energy or served to villagers to increase their friendship with the player. Crafting materials are used at Crafting Stations to create furniture, consumables, and even other materials.

There is a fourth type of catch that players can obtain by fishing in the sands of Eternity Isle’s Glittering Dunes biome that are considered Dairy & Oil ingredients when cooking. This small selection of catches includes just two creatures: Sand Worm and Scorpion.

Catching Fish & Seafood With Fishing

There are a total of 40 different species of fish, seafood, or creature ingredients that players can catch using their Royal Fishing Rod. The Valley is home to 25 unique species, and the expansion’s Eternity Isle region features 15 exclusive species of its own on the list. A small selection of Valley fish can be caught in Eternity Isle, but no Eternity Isle fish can be caught in the Valley.

Catching Crafting Materials With Fishing

There is also a small assortment of materials that players can obtain via fishing that are exclusively for use in crafting items, unlike fish, which are primarily for preparing meals in Disney Dreamlight Valley . This short list features just 5 unique materials : Seaweed, Red Algae, Bones, Plastic Scrap, and Scales. Seaweed and Red Algae can be obtained in every biome in both the Valley and Eternity Isle, but Bones, Plastic Scrap, and Scales are exclusive to Eternity Isle regions.

Seaweed is the only catch that is used both in cooking and crafting. For the sake of cooking, it is considered a Vegetable, while in crafting it can be found in the Refined Materials category.

All Fish & Ingredients and Where to Catch Them

Below is a full list of all fish, seafood, and creatures players can catch via Fishing. It is important to note that three of Dreamlight Valley 's fish have additional criteria which must be met before players can find and catch these fish:

  • Fugu – Can be caught only when it is raining.
  • Here and There Fish – Can only be caught only in the hours between 6am to 10am and 6pm to 10pm. They will only be available during and after completing Nala's Friendship Quest "Here and There and Back Again."
  • Kingfish – Can be caught only in the hours between 6pm to 5am .

Additionally, some fish available exclusively in A Rift in Time 's Eternity Isle biomes require the player to unlock certain sub-areas of each of the expansion's biomes before they can be accessed.

All Fishable Materials and Where to Catch Them

Here is a comprehensive list of all crafting materials obtainable through fishing in Disney Dreamlight Valley . Some items have unique catching conditions, which are also detailed below.

All Seasonal Fish in Disney Dreamlight Valley

In Dreamlight Valley, there are five seasonal variants of some year-round fish, which can only be caught in special pools that appear during the holiday season, typically from mid to late December. Each of these fish can be caught just once, as their pools do not reappear in future seasons. These fish serve no purpose other than to fulfill an associated seasonal Dreamlight Duty.

Roblox players can master the art of driving in Car Dealership Tycoon . The game combines two exceedingly popular Roblox game genres, which is why it has become so popular with fans. To further enhance the gaming experience, players can use the Car Dealership Tycoon codes listed in this article.

Updated March 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Car Dealership Tycoon codes can provide a lot of extra cash to enhance your experience. Make sure to redeem any available codes before they expire for maximum benefits.

Codes Checked on March 4, 2025.

  • 900MVisits - Claim the code for 90k Cash

How to Redeem Codes in Car Dealership Tycoon

In order to redeem codes in Car Dealership Tycoon , players will need to follow the steps below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Car Dealership Tycoon
  • At the top, locate the Settings button.
  • Press it, and insert the code into the text box.
  • Once done, press the “+” button and claim free rewards.

Players should remember that a single code can only be redeemed once (just like in most other Roblox games). That said, there's nothing stopping players from redeeming the same code on multiple accounts.

How to Play Car Dealership Tycoon

The mechanics of Car Dealership Tycoon are not much different from other similar games. To begin with, players need to stand on the first pressure plate, and after they progress, stand on the others. That's how the dealership is built. There are three methods to earn money in the game, the first is to enter Car Dealership Tycoon codes like the ones that players can find above, the second is to sell cars to customers, and the third is to drive around the city.

The Best Roblox Tycoon Games Like Car Dealership Tycoon

Although this Tycoon can be played for a very long time, there will inevitably come a time when the game simply doesn't have much to offer anymore. At such moments, players may find themselves looking for similar games. Therefore, below, fans can find five great Roblox games like Car Dealership Tycoon :

  • Become a Hacker to Prove Dad Wrong Tycoon
  • Anime Power Tycoon
  • The Resistance Tycoon
  • Military Tycoon
  • Princess Castle Tycoon

About the Car Dealership Tycoon Developers

Foxzie released Car Dealership Tycoon quite recently, and players liked it so much that his Roblox group quickly gained 5 million members. So far, this is the only game from this developer, but fans hope he will start working on a new project.

item.title: Civilization 7: How to Complete the Great Library Legacy Path
item.description:
One of the unique mechanics that differentiates Civilization 7 from previous entries in the franchise is the Age mechanic. This mechanic makes play sessions much more engaging and gives the player smaller milestones to aim towards in the form of Legacy Paths . There are three Ages in the game, and each age comes with four Legacy Paths that the player can pursue.

In the Antiquity Age, players can choose the Culture, Military, Science, or Economic Legacy Path, each of which grants the player special bonuses that can be implemented in the next Age when completed. The Science Legacy Path is called the Great Library Legacy Pat h, and requires the player to obtain a certain number of Codices to complete.

How to Complete the Great Library Legacy Path in Civilization 7

Each Legacy Path is divided into three milestones, with each one giving special bonuses to the player. There are many steps that the player needs to take to complete this path, but the main object of the Great Library Legacy Path is quite simple:

Display 10 Codices in your Empire.

There are two main things that players will need to contend with to complete this Legacy Path: obtain Codices, and display them in their Settlements. However, there are 6 total steps to the Legacy Path that the player needs to go through.

  1. Research the Writing technology.
  2. Build a Library and Research Writing 2.
  3. Research Mathematics and build an Academy.
  4. Milestone 1: Collect & Display 3 Codices
  5. Milestone 2: Collect & Display 6 Codices.
  6. Milestone 3: Collect & Display 10 Codices.

How to Obtain Codices in Civilization 7

Codices are Great Works that players can only obtain in the Antiquity Age. These great works need to be housed within the Palace, certain World Wonders, Academies, and Libraries within the player's settlements. Each Codex has +2 Science when displayed. There are a few different ways to obtain Codices, though the main method is through the Technology tech tree:

  • Technologies
    • Writing Mastery
    • Currency Mastery
    • The Wheel Mastery
    • Military Training Mastery
    • Engineering Mastery
    • Navigation Mastery
    • Mathematics Mastery (grants two codices)

  • Literacy Civic
  • Narrative Events
  • City-State Suzerain Bonus
  • Nalanda Wonder: gives one Codex and two Codex slots

Rewards for Completing the Great Library Legacy Path in Civilization 7

There are three milestones for each Legacy Path in the game. These milestones serve as a way for the player to get rewards even if they don't finish the entire path. Each milestone gives the player Legacy Points and a Legacy, both of which become relevant when the next Age starts. If the player doesn't complete any milestones at all, they get a Dark Age Legacy, a powerful boon that comes with a caveat. If the player completes the full Legacy Path, they unlock a Golden Age. In each Age, only one Golden Age and a Dark Age can be selected.

Milestone

Unlocked Legacies

Explanation

Cost

First Milestone Reward

Scientific Attribute Point

Gain 1 Scientific Attribute Point

1 Scientific Legacy Point

Second Milestone Reward

Collector of Knowledge

+1 Science for every Codex in Antiquity

2 Scientific Legacy Points

Third Milestone Reward

Great Library Golden Age

Academies become Golden Age Academies

2 Scientific Legacy Points

item.title: Roblox: Monkey Tycoon Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Monkey Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Monkey Tycoon
  • How to Get More Monkey Tycoon Codes

Monkey Tycoon is a Roblox game that involves developing your banana farm. It's a bit strange that monkeys don't eat bananas but produce them, but that only makes the game more fun. You need to collect and sell bananas, buy new monkeys, and even sacrifice them. The game has many ways to speed up your progress, but they cost Robux. Fortunately, you can redeem Monkey Tycoon codes and get many rewards for free.

Updated March 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Redeemable codes in Monkey Tycoon can grant various in-game rewards, including sacrifices, monkeys, and special effects. Some codes even offer unique surprises when used under specific conditions. Keep an eye out for more updates and new rewards.

All Monkey Tycoon Codes

Working Monkey Tycoon Codes

  • HughMungus - Enter this code to get some sacrifices.
  • /codelist - Enter this code to get some sacrifices.
  • bugfixing - Enter this code to get some sacrifices.
  • BloodForTheBloodGod - Enter this code to get some sacrifices.
  • boogers - Enter this code to get some monkeys. (You can use this code at night at the ghost near the leaderboard.)
  • bottle - Enter this code to get some sacrifices.
  • Asteroid - Enter this code to get some sacrifices.
  • RollTheDice - Enter this code to get a random amount of monkeys.
  • PlayStreetWars - Enter this code to get some sacrifices.
  • Freeslimemonkey - Enter this code and see what happens.
  • MichaelsaJoestar - Enter this code to get 10,000 monkeys.
  • ELSEP03M - Enter this code to get 10,000 monkeys.
  • Boostmeup - Enter this code to get a 3x time boost.
  • IHopeNothingBadHappens - Enter this code to kill your character.
  • Balls - Enter this code to summon some balls.
  • LotsOfMonkeys - Enter this code to get monkeys and higher-tier monkeys.

Expired Monkey Tycoon Codes

  • Arboreal
  • Baboon
  • Radiation
  • Gorilla
  • statues
  • Hot
  • GOOBLESTHEALIEN
  • Monkey Backwards
  • Murder
  • Nirvana
  • Orangutan
  • Primate
  • Simian
  • Nevergonnagiveyouup
  • Nevergonnaletyoudown
  • Nevergonnarunaroundanddesertyou
  • Nevergonnamakeyoucry
  • Nevergonnasaygoodbye
  • Nevergonnatellalieandhurtyou
  • Thanks
  • Ape
  • Bakery
  • Nothing
  • Plantain
  • Cipher
  • RIGVSQERGIV
  • MonkeyTycoonForever
  • Tarantula
  • September
  • Medusa
  • 142496

How to Redeem Codes in Monkey Tycoon

As in many other Roblox games, Monkey Tycoon allows you to redeem codes and get rewards. You can do it with just a few clicks. However, if you need some help, you can use our guide below where we will explain how to redeem codes in Monkey Tycoon .

  • Open Roblox and launch Monkey Tycoon .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Click the Codes button with a question mark.
  • In the dark field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Apply Code.

How to Get More Monkey Tycoon Codes

More Roblox codes can be found on the developer's social media or our website. We write new guides with codes every day and update them regularly, so you can always get rewards. To avoid losing the page, pin it in your browser using the keyboard shortcut Ctrl + D. If you would like to visit the social media of the Monkey Tycoon developers, you can find them at the links below:

  • Monkey Tycoon Roblox group
  • Monkey Tycoon Discord server
